180  template<class VariantType>
181  inline void setUniformValue(const GStringView& uniformName, const VariantType& value, bool updateGL = false) {
182  m_newUniformCount++;
183  if (m_uniformQueue.size() < m_newUniformCount) {
184  m_uniformQueue.resize(m_newUniformCount);
185  }
186  uint32_t uniformIndex = m_newUniformCount - 1;
187  m_uniformQueue[uniformIndex] = { uniformName, value };
188  //Vec::EmplaceBack(m_uniformQueue, uniformName, value);
189 #ifdef DEBUG_MODE
190  if (m_uniformQueue[m_newUniformCount - 1].getName().isEmpty()) {
191  Logger::Throw("Error, empty uniform name");
192  }
193 #endif
194  if (updateGL) updateUniforms();
195  }
196  void setUniformValue(const Uniform& uniform, bool updateGL = false);
197

246  inline GLuint getUniformID(const GStringView& uniformName) {
247  return m_uniformInfo.at(uniformName).m_uniformID;
248  }
249 
252  inline GLuint getUniformIDGL(const GStringView& uniformName) {
253  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
254  return gl.glGetUniformLocation(m_programID, uniformName.c_str());
255  }
256 
258  template<typename T>
259  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const T& value) = delete;
260 
261  template<>
262  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const unsigned int& value) {
263  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
264  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
265  gl.glUniform1ui(uniformID, value);
266  }
267 
268  template<>
269  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const int& value) {
270  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
271  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
272  gl.glUniform1i(uniformID, value);
273  }
274 
275  template<>
276  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const float& value) {
277  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
278  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
279  gl.glUniform1f(uniformID, value);
280  }
281 
282  template<>
283  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const Vector2f& value) {
284  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
285  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
286  gl.glUniform2fv(uniformID, 1, value.data());
287  }
288 
289  template<>
290  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const Vector3f& value) {
291  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
292  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
293  gl.glUniform3fv(uniformID, 1, value.data());
294  }
295 
296  template<>
297  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const Vector4f& value) {
298  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
299  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
300  gl.glUniform4fv(uniformID, 1, value.data());
301  }
302 
303  template<>
304  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const Matrix2x2& value) {
305  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
306  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
307  gl.glUniformMatrix2fv(uniformID, 1, GL_FALSE, value.m_mtx[0].data()); // uniform ID, count, transpose, value
308  }
309 
310  template<>
311  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const Matrix3x3& value) {
312  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
313  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
314  gl.glUniformMatrix3fv(uniformID, 1, GL_FALSE, value.m_mtx[0].data()); // uniform ID, count, transpose, value
315  }
316 
317  template<>
318  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const Matrix4x4& value) {
319  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
320  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
321  gl.glUniformMatrix4fv(uniformID, 1, GL_FALSE, value.m_mtx[0].data()); // uniform ID, count, transpose, value
322  }
323 
324  template<>
325  void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const std::vector<Matrix4x4>& value);
326 
327  template<>
328  inline void setUniformValueGL(const GStringView& uniformName, const std::vector<float>& value) {
329  GL::OpenGLFunctions& gl = *GL::OpenGLFunctions::Functions();
330  GLuint uniformID = getUniformID(uniformName);
331  gl.glUniform1fv(uniformID, (GLsizei)value.size(), value.data());
332  }
